recommendations: Sumit Rungta â€œIt was a pleasure working with Sagar on our Valuation engagement with Duff & Phelps. We had reached out to Duff & Phelps at the last hour and Sagar was instrumental in completing the analysis of our business within a few days. He had to burn midnight oil for a number of days, including weekends, to ensure that the final report was available before our Investor meetings. Really thankful to him for all the efforts and patiently managing our expectations. Look forward to working with you again !â€
